name: Git Filter
body:
### Git Filter, a filter for git.
git_filter is a small program using libgit2 which can filter the history of a git repository and produce a new history based on it. It is useful when you want to split a larger repository into several smaller ones and preserve history in each piece.

### Authors and Contributors
Brian Murphy (@slobobaby)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
